description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Support.Item.KomM6mTwJAzvqAgi]{Wood Elemental Support Benefit}

If you hit with a Strike that deals damage to a creature in your wood elemental's reach, the creature takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (–10 on a critical success).

rules.text: If you hit with a Strike that deals damage to a creature in your wood elemental's reach, the creature takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.U2mkebPNSs531ADL]{Effect: Wood Elemental Support Benefit (-5-foot penalty)}
rules.title: {item|name}

rules.text: If you hit with a Strike that deals damage to a creature in your wood elemental's reach, the creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.FPqIVdqeegX6YATJ]{Effect: Wood Elemental Support Benefit (-10-foot penalty)}
